Name: Adventure mosaics. Lost Expedition
About the game: After her plane crashes, Ellie sets off on a perilous adventure to return home. The journey won’t be easy, but Ellie’s faithful friends will come to the rescue. Working together, they can survive anything—be it the desert lands or the tropical jungle! 150 colored Japanese crossword puzzles of all difficulty levels, a pleasant summer story, and charming music will help you pass the time and have a ton of fun! Puzzles are a great opportunity to challenge yourself! Complete the levels, solve the puzzles, and help Ellie and her friends get home! - 150 colorful and memorable levels! - Striking visual effects! - An exciting adventure! - Rich summer colors! - Improve your logical and abstract thinking! - User-friendly interface and addictive gameplay!
